metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0367 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - untriaged.
metadata.Description:
Mediawiki before 1.28.1 / 1.27.2 contains an unsafe use of temporary directory, where having LocalisationCache directory default to system tmp directory is insecure.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.4-3').
